# Science Experiment Game - Copilot Instructions

## Project Type
Static web application (HTML/CSS/JavaScript) - No build tools required.

## Structure
- `index.html` - Main entry point
- `css/styles.css` - All styles  
- `js/app.js` - Main game logic and screen management
- `js/experiments.js` - Experiment/creation game logic
- `js/maze.js` - Maze bonus game logic
- `js/sounds.js` - Web Audio API sound effects
- `README.md` - Documentation

## Development
- Open `index.html` in a browser or use VS Code Live Server
- No dependencies or build steps required
- Fully static - deploy to any static host (GitHub Pages, Netlify, etc.)

## Conventions
- Mobile-first, touch-friendly design
- Large tap targets (min 44px) for young children
- Bright, kid-friendly color palette
- Web Audio API for sound effects (no external audio files)
- All assets are emoji-based or CSS-generated (no external images)
